/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, providing a driver's eye view of the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds. The street itself is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the road, their facades bathed in the soft light of the day. Streetlights stand sentinel along the sidewalk, ready to illuminate the path as dusk falls. The image is taken from a low angle, looking down the length of the street, giving a sense of depth and scale to the scene.
